monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Acid Hurricane
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 75% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.description: 4 x 65% (260%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (water)

skills.description: 5 x 45% (225%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Combo Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 30% of Magic value.

skills.name: Combo Initiator
skills.description: If this Monster acts first in the turn, it deals 25% more damage with its attack and deals an additional 25% damage hit.

skills.name: Corrosion
skills.description: Unique Aura: Armor Break increases the Poison, Burn, Shock and Congeal damage enemies take by 20%.

skills.name: Curse Chain
skills.description: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Full Defense
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility & Spellshield (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Defense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility, Spellshield & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Defense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility, Spellshield, Regeneration & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (60 + 20% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Charging
skills.description: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (85 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (100 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (130 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Mastery
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) are increased by 20%.

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Healing Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (250 + 80% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (200 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (200 + 40% Magic)

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Mana Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Increases Mana Regeneration of the whole party by 10%.

skills.name: Multi Armor Break
skills.description: Aura: Armor Break (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Plague
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Poison damage, 40% chance that the Poison spreads to another enemy.

skills.name: Preparation
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party starts the combat with a random Buff.

skills.name: Purify
skills.description: Healing actions also remove 4 harmful Stacks (Bleed, Wound, Blind, Tether). Multi-Target-Heals remove 2.

skills.name: Replenish
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (300 + 50% Magic) Shield all for 2 x (350 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Slime Infestation
skills.description: Aura: Each Slime in your party applies Armor Break on a random enemy after each action.

skills.name: Slime Shot
skills.description: 4 x 35% (140%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime-ageddon
skills.description: 9 x 60% (540%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison & Weakness (Debuffs)

skills.name: Sorcery
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Supply
skills.description: Aura: Heal all Monsters in the party by 4% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Toxic Support
skills.description: Every heal applied by this monster has a 10% chance to apply Poison to a random enemy. This Monster can apply an additional stack of Poison.

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Weaken
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Weakness.

skills.name: Wind Weakness
skills.description: Wind damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Wizardry
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Wizardry Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Wizardry Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs) to whole party
